titleStmt.title: The rocke, or, A setled heart in unsetled times a short discourse minding and helping Gods people to make use of their faith for moderating their feares in these sad times of the sorrowes of Sion : being the heads of some sermons preached lately and now published for that purpose / by William Jemmat ...
titleStmt.author: Jemmat, William, 1596?-1678.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
